还记得是从16年夏天开始，当时暴雪还是业界顶尖，作为刚刚接触3A游戏的我瞬间被它吸引。看到双龙的震撼，收到温斯顿召唤的热血，让我下定决心，攒下对当时的我来说是巨款的98元，成为守望者。但是从什么时候改变的呢、是排位越来越坐牢的时候吗、是平衡改动让普通玩家怨声载道的时候吗、是好友列表一个一个灰掉的时候吗、是暴雪宣布退出中国市场的时候吗。

我想一棵树的死亡是缓慢而又坚定的

守望1关服前几个小时，我和十几个玩家挤在听歌房里，我们在房间里一边听歌一边发你好，当时大家也许都相信守望归来会成为我们新的家，这种没由来的信任就像以前和朋友开黑的快乐，就像第一次打出团灭的激动，就像通过跳跳乐的成就感一样，真实而又强烈。

祝愿守望蒸蒸日上，祝愿暴雪早日破产

Removed fire system, downgraded ui and match end screen, they say they updated the graphics but they just made some new default skins for heroes. No sense of progression and battlepass filled with useless shitt not worth even as a free thing to farm for lmao. Literally nothing is new and at this point just shut this game down please. I am glad they called it overwatch 2 cuz now overwatch 1's legacy is somewhat still intact,  now i can say Overwatch 1 was effin great and overwatch 2 is the shittiest game ever.

I have over 1000 hours played on this game. I played the closed beta, I made top 500, I was #1 ranked Ana on Ps4 for a good while, I played open division tournaments, and I cannot recommend this game in the slightest. Post 2018, Blizzard dropped this game hardcore, and OW2 is terrible even by live-service standards. Skins are severely overpriced, "story missions" are paid and overpriced, the battlepass has no premium currency so doesn't pay itself like all other passes. DO NOT SPEND MONEY ON THIS GAME, you are only encouraging this disgusting behaviour that is plaguing the industry recently

买了三个了，质量非常好，与卖家描述一致，孩子们都特别喜欢吃，吃过都睡了，版型也很好，面料舒适，尺码标准，不沾杯持妆久，橘色系更加显白，洗完也很柔顺头发也不油了，屏幕清晰运行流畅，敏感肌用起来毫无压力，握感舒适不伤牙龈，每次炒菜都会放几滴，用起来和真人差不多，很舒服。很满意的一次购物，强烈推荐

Pros:
- Visually looks amazing.
- Hit feedback, sound design, and general game feel is some of the best in the industry.
- Runs great, even on a low spec PC.
- Ping system is well implemented.
- At its best, inherits the fun from Overwatch 1.

Cons:
- The shift to 5v5 and introduction of role queue has destroyed queue times for DPS players.
- The removal of CC while not reworking characters have made some characters very niche.
- Most support characters are not amazingly designed, outside of Kiriko and Lucio.
- The counter pick meta is absolutely vile, and it will become obvious even in casual play.
- The current PvE is basically a wave shooter. It isn't facilitated by being a hero shooter at all.
- The obsession to remove CC has also affected PvE, where wave control is not a thing.
- Micro transactions are overpriced, battle pass is too grindy.

If you haven't played Overwatch 1, worth a try. Played a lot more hours on BattleNet and PlayStation, so don't pay too much attention to hours clocked on Steam.

People just like to complain

So we need to make something clear: 90% of the review-bombers of this game are overgrown man-children who got angry the second their favourite game got a few changes. Oh no, changes in a live-service game, who could've seen it coming?

They're gonna tell you it's a cash-grab now (it's not, all real-money transactions are purely cosmetic except for the inconsequential story mission pack) and that it's unplayable now (it's 5v5 instead of 6v6; really, unplayable? The game's smoother than it's ever been, grow up).

And I need to point out that 99% of these reviews are from people who have hundreds, if not thousands of hours into the game and who still play daily. Would be pretty hypocritical if I did a negative review of a game I've spent over a thousand hours in, wouldn't it?

The game's still one of the best team shooters you'll ever find, and it keeps getting better over time. Of course no one's a fan of the season pass model, of course the game's got its issues. And yes, the one valid concern in all of this, about Blizzard being a terrible company, is very much a cause for concern. But the same can be said for all (and I mean ALL) big companies in the gaming industry who keep treating their employees like garbage. So let's not pretend that this is any more specific to them than it is of every single other psycho company out there, we're looking at the game here and the game is damn fine. 

Grow up, accept change and go vent somewhere else. Push the mass hypocrisy aside and no one can deny this is an excellent game.

Switched from BNet to Steam coz if I can I want a single launcher for all my games.

Anyways, I have been playing Overwatch since the first game came out in 2016 (probably thousands of hours in-game), and I have to say that Overwatch 2 is a worthy sequel that improves on many aspects of the original. The game is still the best hero shooter I have ever played, with a diverse and balanced roster of characters, each with their own unique abilities and playstyles. The game modes are fun and varied, from the classic team-based objectives to the new co-op missions that let you explore the rich lore and story of the Overwatch universe. The graphics are colorful and fun, the sound design is immersive, and the voice acting is superb.

However, Overwatch 2 is not without its flaws and controversies. Some of the major issues that have caused debate and dissatisfaction among the fans are:

- The removal of levels and loot boxes, which means that players can no longer earn cosmetic items or show their experience through their player icons. Instead, the game has introduced a battle pass system, which is free-to-play but also offers a premium option that gives instant access to new heroes and items. Some players feel that this change has made the game more accessible and fair, while others feel that it has made the game more pay-to-win and less rewarding.

- The delay and cancellation of some PvE content, which means that players have to wait longer to enjoy the story mode and the co-op missions that were promised at Blizzcon 2019. Some of the features that were announced, such as hero status and skill trees, have also been scrapped or changed. Some players feel that this change has made the game more polished and focused, while others feel that it has made the game less innovative and ambitious.


Despite these controversies, I still love Overwatch 2 and I think it is a great game that deserves a chance. It is a game that brings people together, whether they are friends or strangers, to cooperate and compete in a friendly and respectful manner. It is a game that celebrates diversity, inclusion, and HEROISM in a WORLD that NEEDS it more than ever.

If you are a fan of Overwatch, or if you are looking for a fun and engaging hero shooter, I highly recommend Overwatch 2. It is a game that will keep you entertained for hours, days, weeks, months, and years. It is a game that will make you laugh, cry, rage, and cheer.

I give Overwatch 2 a thumbs up 👍 even against the overwhelming majority of negative reviews.

这个游戏太棒了它治好了我的慢性支气管炎、哮喘、肺气肿、支气管扩张、肺炎、百日咳、支原体肺炎、气胸、疱疹性咽峡炎、成人呼吸窘迫综合征、慢性貫炎、貫癌、便秘、慢性腹泻、急性貫炎、急性腐蚀性胃炎、胃肠道功能紊乱、食物中毒、腹痛、大肠癌、消化性溃疡糖尿病、 甲亢血液科白 血病、地中海贫血、淋巴瘤、再生障碍性贫血、过敏性紫癜、维生素B12缺乏所致贫、缺铁性贫血、染、慢性肾炎、肾积水、尿道炎、尿毒症、肾囊肿、肾结石、急性肾心血管内科高血压、 冠心病、心肌炎、心肌梗死、先天性心脏病、艾滋病、百日咳、母乳性黄疸、小儿发烧、败血症、奶癣、小儿肺炎、地中海贫血、尿布疹、小儿脑瘫、手足口病、儿童遗尿症、婴幼儿腹泻、疝气、小儿营养不良、自闭症、小儿多动症、渐冻症，每晚睡觉前我都会回想一遍它的剧情另外科比·比恩·布莱恩特（Kobe Bean Bryant，1978年8月23日—2020年1月26日），出生于美国宾夕法尼亚州费城，前美国职业篮球运动员，司职得分后卫/小前锋（锋卫摇摆人），绰号“黑曼巴”（Black Mamba）1996年NBA选秀，科比于第1轮第13位被夏洛特黄蜂队选中，后被交易至洛杉矶湖人队，整个NBA生涯都效力于洛杉矶湖人队。湖人生涯随湖人队5夺NBA总冠军；荣膺1次常规赛MVP，2次总决赛MVP，4次全明星赛MVP；共18次入选NBA全明星阵容，15次入选NBA最佳阵容，12次入选NBA最佳防守阵容；国家队生涯两夺奥运会金牌2016年4月14日，科比·布莱恩特在生涯最后一场主场对阵爵士的常规赛后宣布退役。2017年12月19日，湖人主场对阵勇士，中场时刻为科比的8号和24号两件球衣举行了退役仪式。2018年3月13日，科比凭借和动画师格兰·基恩合作的短片《亲爱的篮球》获第90届奥斯卡最佳短片奖。2020年1月26日（当地时间，北京时间为2020年1月27日），科比在加州卡拉巴萨斯因直升机事故遇难，享年41岁；4月5日，科比正式入选奈·史密斯篮球名人纪念堂；8月13日，美国加州的橙县（Orange County）宣布8月24日为“科比日”

最美的不是下雨天而是暴雪脑壳落地的瞬间。等会去转发两条锦鲤保佑考迪克马今晚不用再死一遍。你永远是会指导玩家玩游戏的，贵司决策层的妈是永远去世的。买寿衣不？看你们决策层人多打五折。火化场问你妈要几分熟？七分熟？那不好意思了，你妈又粘锅了。城外火光冲天三十里，全是你妈飘零的骨灰。

仅此以炉石 OW 风暴玩家对暴雪管理层&决策层，献上祝福：
秋来不过六月五，缩衣缺食哭父母。
摇尾乞怜还不够，卑躬屈膝尽辗挪。
尸餐位素不如狗，不礼不智尚可杀。

什么？这不是守望先锋2啊🙌，这是暴雪木琴的古灰盒，体积小方便携带👍，拆开一包✋😀，放水里就散开，怎么找都找不回来，用来泡水😋😋，冲厕所，拖地都是很好用的😋😋，你看打开以后像奶茶粉一样碎👍✋，放在水里遇水溶解不见，溶解性很强的。冲开以后，是一杯强效加量的洁厕灵，你看它怎么用都用不完👍👍，不掉伤手不伤地，使用一辈子都没问题，大扫除带上它非常方便，用它洗袜子，再拖地板，冲厕所，干净卫生。什么?在哪里买?👆👆右上角寿衣商店，买一盒送一盒😋😋😋😋😋😋
